Packages that use IObject
com.ibm.ruler   
 

Uses of IObject in com.ibm.ruler
 

Subinterfaces of IObject in com.ibm.ruler
 interface ICastle
          This interface is implemented by all castles.
 interface IKnight
          This interface is implemented by all knights.
 interface IPeasant
          This interface is implemented by all peasants.
 

Methods in com.ibm.ruler that return IObject
static IObject World.getObjectAt(int x, int y)
          Returns the peasant, knight, or castle that is at the given location, or null if there is nothing at the given location or it is out of bounds.
